body_html: @Engineero : Here is a dumb question that you may be able to help with. If TF is capable of auto-unrolling LSTMs, then why do we need to use the for loop (in the sample above) to feed in the words one at a time? I've never understood this.

body: @Engineero : Here is a dumb question that you may be able to help with.  If TF is capable of auto-unrolling LSTMs, then why do we need to use the `for` loop (in the sample above) to feed in the words one at a time?  I've never understood this.
